title: Windows 64 bit error
body:
I tried to reinstall the lol but so it shows me, 2 days ago it was going totally perfect and 2 days ago, the evening when I wanted to come in to play it showed me this error .. I reinstalled the lol of many Times and so. Please help me .. Please Riot
 
Photot error : http://i.imgur.com/O5pzOtR.png 

Please Riot , help me..

replies.body: I can't translate that error I'm afraid, but we can still help!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this directly with you.  We'll reply back as soon as we can and figure out this error.
